import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Image,NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const NavBar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartState = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer) const userState = useSelector((state) => state.loginUserReducer) const { currentUser } = userState return ( <>
{ currentUser ? ( {/* {currentUser.name} */} Order LogOut ) : (<> {" "} Login Register {" "} ) } Cart {cartState.cartItems.length}
) } export default NavBar
